form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to retain a copy of any reprimand or admonishment received by an employee of the Department in the permanent record of the employee.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Ensuring VA Employee Accountability Act.

section.header: Retention of records of reprimands and admonishments received by employees of the Department of Veterans Affairs

subsection.text: Chapter 7 of title 38, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following new section:

section.text: If any employee of the Department receives a reprimand or admonishment, the Secretary shall retain a copy of such reprimand or admonishment in the permanent record of the employee as long as the employee is employed by the Department.
